flawed_nl_solution:
At a germination rate of 3/5, 25 seeds will yield 3/5*25=<<3/5*25=125/3>>125/3 plants.
At a germination rate of 4/5, 25 seeds will yield 4/5*25=<<4/5*25=20>>20 plants.
In total, she will have grown 125/3+20=<<125/3+20=185/3>>185/3 plants.
If 4/5 of the plants developed flowers, then she will have grown (4/5)*185/3=<<(4/5)*185/3=148/3>>148/3 plants that produce flowers.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 125/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
